text: The army is wreathed in a light mist to shield their movement and aid their attack.
Stance: Mist Wreath
The Fimir conjure swirling mists from which to trap their enemies.
Stance: Mist Trap
Sets up a defensive camp, allowing for recruitment and replenishment, whilst raiding wealth from the local region.
Stance: Raiding Camp
War Fervour
Something higher pushes this force to its limits for now at least...
Rise of the Hell-Mother
ME! ME! I SSSHALL BE RULER OF ALL FIMIR! THEN THE HU-MANSSS WILL FEAR USSS AGAIN! WE WILL RETAKE WHAT ISSS OURSSS! HELLMOTHER SKATTACH SHALL RULE ALL!
Fanatics of Kroll

The Tendrils of Doom are a fanatic sect of Fimir, dedicating to worshipping Kroll the All-Mother not as a Daemon Princess, but as the supreme Fimir goddess. They seek to make her apotheosis a reality, hoping they will be rewarded with rulersihp over the world when she turns it into a cursed bog for all eternity.
Slave Built
Work the slaves until they're near death and then sacrifice them.
Unnatural Fog
With a great expenditure of slave lives Fimir can blanket a whole province in an inpenetrable fog.
Unnatural Fog
With a great expenditure of slave lives Fimir can blanket a whole province in an inpenetrable fog.
Trifling God
In the bogs and swamps where Fimir dwell Kroll is spoken of in hushed tones.
Renegade God
Kroll makes her bid for godhood, and Fimir are there do her bidding.
Patron God
Continent-spanning Fimir-built temples, blood sacrifices made therein, all for their godess Kroll.
God of the Depths
Kroll is now a minor Chaos God, and Fimir are her blessed children.
Apotheosis of Kroll: Trifling God
In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.

In her quest for godhood Kroll gives bonuses to her personal army and can gain a diplomacy bonus with all Fimir.
